meanings.definition: The bone on the inner side of the forearm.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her ulnae after lifting heavy boxes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the ulnae to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The ulnae decided to take a break from supporting the arm.
meanings.sent4: The ulnae, like sturdy pillars, provided structure to the forearm.
meanings.sent5: The ulnae, slender and strong, ran parallel along the forearm.
